behavior find_remote_control():
    body:
        foreach remote_control: item:
            if is_remote_control(remote_control) and not visited(remote_control):
                observe(remote_control, "Locate the remote control for the TV")

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        find_remote_control()

behavior turn_on_tv_with_remote(remote_control:item, tv:item):
    body:
        achieve_once inhand(remote_control) # Temporarily take the remote control in hand
        achieve close(remote_control, tv)  # Ensure the remote control is close to the TV
        achieve is_off(remote_control)     # Ensure the remote is off to start with
        touch(remote_control)              # Touch the remote to use it

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        bind remote_control: item where:
            is_remote_control(remote_control)
        bind tv: item where:
            is_television(tv)
        turn_on_tv_with_remote(remote_control, tv)
